snippet: David Wax and Suz Slezak of David Wax Museum explain how their sound has evolved with their new album, “Knock Knock Get Up.”
abstract: Excerpts from a conversation with David Wax and Suz Slezak of indie folk band David Wax Museum about their latest album and particular hybrid sound.
lead_paragraph: David Wax and Suz Slezak of David Wax Museum explain how their sound has evolved with their new album, “Knock Knock Get Up.”

headline.seo: David Wax and Suz Slezak on Their Music’s Mexican Influence
headline.main: Finding a Path to Mexico in Appalachia
headline.print_headline: Finding a Path to Mexico in Appalachia
headline.content_kicker: A Word With: David Wax and Suz Slezak
